heading: HR00353
0: RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE AND THE VFA COMMISSION TO ALLOW AN INSPECTION BY THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE DETENTION FACILITIES WHERE US MARINE LANCE CORPORAL JOSEPH SCOTT PEMBERTON IS SERVING HIS SENTENCE FOR THE DEATH OF FILIPINO TRANSGENDER JEFFREY 'JENNIFER' LAUDE, PURSUANT TO THE EXPRESSED INDEPENDENT FOREIGN POLICY OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE
status: Pending with the Committee on FOREIGN AFFAIRS since 2016-09-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00353
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE AND THE VFA COMMISSION TO ALLOW AN INSPECTION BY THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE DETENTION FACILITIES WHERE US MARINE LANCE CORPORAL JOSEPH SCOTT PEMBERTON IS SERVING HIS SENTENCE FOR THE DEATH OF FILIPINO TRANSGENDER JEFFREY 'JENNIFER' LAUDE, PURSUANT TO THE EXPRESSED INDEPENDENT FOREIGN POLICY OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROQUE, HARRY L.

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
